overview:
Ali Kheiri is the founder of EventStorm.com.

EventStorm strives to upgrade your events with a robust and intuitive promotion platform that handles all aspects, from marketing to sales. Users of the service can create invitations, send mass emails or text messages, build custom-tailored event pages, manage payments, and even link out to any social networking site to spread the word. Successful events, now all managed from one app.
